references.reason: This paper introduces consistency models, a new family of generative models that the current paper builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: Improved techniques for training consistency models
references.reason: This paper presents the state-of-the-art consistency training method (iCT), which the current paper analyzes and improves upon for use in latent space.

references.paper_title: Elucidating the design space of diffusion-based generative models
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of diffusion models, which are compared to consistency models in the current paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces latent diffusion models, a key technique used in many large-scale image generation applications that the current paper addresses.
This paper is foundational work in diffusion models, which the current paper compares consistency models against and builds upon.
